title: Ham, feta & soya bean salad

ingredients.item: 50g essential Waitrose British Honey Roast Ham, shredded

instructions.step: Cook the soya beans in boiling water for 3 minutes, then drain and refresh under cold running water. Mix with the feta and ham.
Meanwhile, whisk the oil and vinegar together, and stir in the mint and season. Pour over the feta mixture and toss gently into the salad.
Serve with toasted wholemeal pitta bread.
